definition: (onom.) sound of cawing/sound of infant learning to talk/variant of 呀[ya1]

sentences.english: Lifting kettlebells has a different feel than lifting dumbbells.
sentences.chinese: 起重壶铃有比解除哑铃不同的感觉。

sentences.english: The characteristic trigeminoma appeared as dumb bell with erosion of petrous bone.
sentences.chinese: 三叉神经瘤表现为特征性哑铃形伴岩骨尖骨质破坏。

sentences.english: The nebula was named after its resemblance to a dumbbell when seen in visible light.
sentences.chinese: 该星云因在可见光下观测其形似哑铃而由此得名。

sentences.english: The dumbbell fly is a boxing exercise that strengthens the pectoral muscles and improves endurance.
sentences.chinese: 哑铃飞是一个拳击运动的加强和提高耐力胸肌。

sentences.english: Then you can add dumbbells or a barbell resting on the back of your neck.
sentences.chinese: 然后你可以在你的颈后增加一个固定的哑铃或是杠铃。

sentences.english: Holding a dumbbell in each hand, place one foot on a bench, so that your knee is bent to about 90 degrees.
sentences.chinese: 两手分别各持一哑铃单足立于长凳之上。

sentences.english: The nacelle is lowered onto the tower, which has, by now been fixed into place with dumbbell-sized bolts
sentences.chinese: 机舱放到了塔上，固定机舱用的螺栓有哑铃那么粗。

sentences.english: Many different weight training routines involve the use of standard dumbbells.
sentences.chinese: 许多涉及不同的重量训练程序使用的标准哑铃。

sentences.english: Bend the arm to bring the weight up to the front of the shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 曲臂，将哑铃提至肩的前部。

sentences.english: For biceps I recommend doing dumbbell preacher curls.
sentences.chinese: 对肱二头肌，我推荐哑铃弯举。

sentences.english: Lie on your back and grasp a dumbbell or cable handles in each hand.
sentences.chinese: 仰躺下，双手各抓一个哑铃或者拉缆。

sentences.english: Airshaft of a dumbbell tenement, New York City, taken from the roof, ca.
sentences.chinese: 通风井的哑铃物业单位，纽约市采取从屋顶，钙，。

sentences.english: The tops of structures assume dumbbell form or "8" shape.
sentences.chinese: 这种结构物的顶面观呈哑铃形或“8”字型。

sentences.english: Grab two dumbbells of a comfortable weight, and press the weights from your chest upward.
sentences.chinese: 手举适当重量的哑铃，从胸部开始向上举。

sentences.english: These include lifts with dumbbells and barbells.
sentences.chinese: 这些包括举哑铃和杠铃。

sentences.english: Don't smack the dumbbells together at the top of the movement.
sentences.chinese: 在移动到最上方的时候，不要让哑铃碰到一起。

definition: triceps brachii (back of the upper arm)
latissimus dorsi muscle (back of the chest)
